rukus.text: 78|35|Tata te'omloke kono anarthaka katha arau micha bakya'o suna napaba.
78|36|Aponara pratipalakara phalara paraa puraskara, yathocita danasbaraupa.
78|37|Yijana akasasamuha arau prthirai arau e'i dutara majata yi ache sakalorae pratipalaka, parama karaunamaya, te'omra ocarata abedana-nibedanara sakti sihamtara karao nathakiba.
78|38|Se'idina rauha arau phiraistasakala saraibad'dhabharae thiya ha’ba; rahamane yaka anumati diba tara bahirae kone'o katha naka’ba, arau te'om sathika katha ka’ba.
78|39|E'i dinato satya, eteke yara iccha siye tara pratipalakara ocarata asraya grahana karaka.
78|40|Niscaya ami tomalokaka ati nikatararti sasti samparke satarka karailo. Yidina manuhe nija krtakarma dekhibalai paba arau kaphirae ka’ba, haya! Ma'i yadi mati ha'lohemtena.
